fields.Transcription: toki! nimi mi li jan Kowisi. tenpo suno ni la, mi toki e Toki Pona tawa sina. tenpo ni la, mi lukin e lon lipu nimi tan mi jo ike e pali nimi tan pilin lawa. taso ni li suli ala. mi toki e nasin seme? a, Toki Pona li toki pali. tenpo pini la, jan Sonja Lang li pali e toki ni. ona li pali e ni tan ona li wile sona e ni. toki li pona la, ona li ken sona ala sona? kepeken ni la, ona li pali e ni. toki Pona li jo nimi pi ali mute sike. tan pi ni la, sina wile kama e pilin musi. mi sona e Toki Pona tawa mun tu wan. en tu anu tu wan suno mute la, mi kama sona e nimi ali. Toki Pona li toki musi tawa kama sona. en mi jo e musi pona mute tan mi wile kama sona e toki ni! mi wile e sina tawa kama sona sin! mi tawa!
fields.Translation: Hello! My name is Koishi.Today I‚Äôm going to tell you about Toki Pona. Right now I‚Äôm reading a script because I don‚Äôt do well with improvising. But that‚Äôs not important. What should I talk about? Well, Toki Pona is a constructed language. It was created by Sonja Lang. She created this because she wanted to know if a language that has been simplified can still be understood. Toki Pona has around 120 words, so you have to get creative. I‚Äôve known Toki Pona for three months and I learned all the words in 2 or 3 weeks. Toki Pona is a fun language to learn and I had a lot of fun learning to speak it. I hope you‚Äôll also learn Toki Pona! Take care!

What should I talk about? Well, Toki Pona is a constructed language. It was created by Sonja Lang. She created this because she wanted to know if a language that has been simplified can still be understood. Toki Pona has around 120 words, so you have to get creative.
